feed.title: Paperless-ngx Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.13.1
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.13.1

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: allow removing dead document links from UI, validate via API @shamoon (#8081)
  • Fix: Make all document related objects soft delete, fix filepath when deleted @shamoon (#8067)
  • Fix: handle uuid fields created under mariadb and Django 4 @shamoon (#8034)
  • Fix / Enhancement: auto-rename document files when select type custom fields are changed @shamoon (#8045)
  • Fix: Update filename correctly if the document is in the trash @stumpylog (#8066)
  • Fix: Handle a special case where removing none marker could result in an absolute path @stumpylog (#8060)
  • Fix: disable custom field signals during import in 2.13.0 @shamoon (#8065)
  • Fix: doc link documents search should exclude null @shamoon (#8064)
  • Fix: fix custom field query empty element removal @shamoon (#8056)
  • Fix: dont try to load PAPERLESS_MODEL_FILE as env from file @shamoon (#8040)
  • Fix: dont include all allauth urls @shamoon (#8010)
  • Fix: oauth settings without base url @shamoon (#8020)
  • Fix / Enhancement: include social accounts and api tokens in export @shamoon (#8016)

Maintenance

  • Fix: Removes whitenoise patches and upgrades it to 6.8.1 @stumpylog (#8079)

All App Changes

12 changes - Fix: allow removing dead document links from UI, validate via API @shamoon ([#8081](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8081)) - Fix: Make all document related objects soft delete, fix filepath when deleted @shamoon ([#8067](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8067)) - Fix: handle uuid fields created under mariadb and Django 4 @shamoon ([#8034](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8034)) - Fix: Update filename correctly if the document is in the trash @stumpylog ([#8066](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8066)) - Fix: Handle a special case where removing none marker could result in an absolute path @stumpylog ([#8060](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8060)) - Fix: disable custom field signals during import in 2.13.0 @shamoon ([#8065](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8065)) - Fix: doc link documents search should exclude null @shamoon ([#8064](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8064)) - Enhancement: auto-rename document files when select type custom fields are changed @shamoon ([#8045](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8045)) - Fix: fix custom field query empty element removal @shamoon ([#8056](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8056)) - Fix: dont include all allauth urls @shamoon ([#8010](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8010)) - Enhancement / fix: include social accounts and api tokens in export @shamoon ([#8016](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8016)) - Fix: oauth settings without base url @shamoon ([#8020](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8020))

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.13.2
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.13.2

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: remove auth tokens from export @shamoon (#8100)
  • Fix: cf query dropdown styling affecting other components @shamoon (#8095)

All App Changes

2 changes - Fix: remove auth tokens from export @shamoon ([#8100](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8100)) - Fix: cf query dropdown styling affecting other components @shamoon ([#8095](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8095))

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.13.3
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.13.3

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: fix auto-clean PDFs, create parent dir for storing unmodified original @shamoon (#8157)
  • Fix: correctly handle "exists, false" in custom field query filter @yichi-yang (#8158)
  • Fix: dont use filters for inverted thumbnails in Safari @shamoon (#8121)
  • Fix: use static object for activedisplayfields to prevent changes @shamoon (#8120)
  • Fix: dont invert pdf colors in FF @shamoon (#8110)
  • Fix: make mail account password and refresh token text fields @shamoon (#8107)

Dependencies

8 changes - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the frontend-eslint-dependencies group in /src-ui with 4 updates @dependabot ([#8145](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8145)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @types/node from 22.7.4 to 22.8.6 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#8148](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8148)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @playwright/test from 1.47.2 to 1.48.2 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#8147](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8147)) - Chore(deps): Bump uuid from 10.0.0 to 11.0.2 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#8146](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8146)) - Chore(deps): Bump tslib from 2.7.0 to 2.8.1 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#8149](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8149)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @codecov/webpack-plugin from 1.2.0 to 1.2.1 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#8150](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8150)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @types/jest from 29.5.13 to 29.5.14 in /src-ui in the frontend-jest-dependencies group @dependabot ([#8144](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8144)) - Chore(deps): Bump the frontend-angular-dependencies group in /src-ui with 21 updates @dependabot ([#8143](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8143))

All App Changes

14 changes - Fix: fix auto-clean PDFs, create parent dir for storing unmodified original @shamoon ([#8157](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8157)) - Fix: correctly handle "exists, false" in custom field query filter @yichi-yang ([#8158](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8158)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the frontend-eslint-dependencies group in /src-ui with 4 updates @dependabot ([#8145](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8145)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @types/node from 22.7.4 to 22.8.6 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#8148](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8148)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @playwright/test from 1.47.2 to 1.48.2 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#8147](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8147)) - Chore(deps): Bump uuid from 10.0.0 to 11.0.2 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#8146](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8146)) - Chore(deps): Bump tslib from 2.7.0 to 2.8.1 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#8149](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8149)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @codecov/webpack-plugin from 1.2.0 to 1.2.1 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#8150](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8150)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @types/jest from 29.5.13 to 29.5.14 in /src-ui in the frontend-jest-dependencies group @dependabot ([#8144](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8144)) - Chore(deps): Bump the frontend-angular-dependencies group in /src-ui with 21 updates @dependabot ([#8143](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8143)) - Fix: dont use filters for inverted thumbnails in Safari @shamoon ([#8121](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8121)) - Fix: use static object for activedisplayfields to prevent changes @shamoon ([#8120](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8120)) - Fix: dont invert pdf colors in FF @shamoon ([#8110](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8110)) - Fix: make mail account password and refresh token text fields @shamoon ([#8107](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8107))

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.13.4
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.13.4

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: fix dark mode icon blend mode in 2.13.3 @shamoon (#8166)
  • Fix: fix clipped popup preview in 2.13.3 @shamoon (#8165)

All App Changes

2 changes - Fix: fix dark mode icon blend mode in 2.13.3 @shamoon ([#8166](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8166)) - Fix: fix clipped popup preview in 2.13.3 @shamoon ([#8165](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8165))

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.13.5
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.13.5

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: handle page count exception for pw-protected files @shamoon (#8240)
  • Fix: correctly track task id in list for change detection @shamoon (#8230)
  • Fix: Admin pages should show trashed documents @stumpylog (#8068)
  • Fix: tag colors shouldn't change when selected in list @shamoon (#8225)
  • Fix: fix re-activation of save button when changing array items @shamoon (#8208)
  • Fix: fix thumbnail clipping, select inverted color in safari dark mode not system @shamoon (#8193)
  • Fix: select checkbox should remain visible @shamoon (#8185)
  • Fix: warn with proper error on ASN exists in trash @shamoon (#8176)

Maintenance

  • Chore: Updates all runner images to use Ubuntu Noble @stumpylog (#8213)
  • Chore(deps): Bump stumpylog/image-cleaner-action from 0.8.0 to 0.9.0 in the actions group @dependabot (#8142)

Dependencies

  • Chore(deps): Bump stumpylog/image-cleaner-action from 0.8.0 to 0.9.0 in the actions group @dependabot (#8142)

All App Changes

7 changes - Fix: handle page count exception for pw-protected files @shamoon ([#8240](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8240)) - Fix: correctly track task id in list for change detection @shamoon ([#8230](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8230)) - Fix: Admin pages should show trashed documents @stumpylog ([#8068](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8068)) - Fix: tag colors shouldn't change when selected in list @shamoon ([#8225](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8225)) - Fix: fix re-activation of save button when changing array items @shamoon ([#8208](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8208)) - Fix: fix thumbnail clipping, select inverted color in safari dark mode not system @shamoon ([#8193](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8193)) - Fix: select checkbox should remain visible @shamoon ([#8185](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8185)) - Fix: warn with proper error on ASN exists in trash @shamoon ([#8176](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/8176))
